definition: move (in chess, on stage, in martial arts)/gambit/trick/scheme/movement/same as 著數|着数[zhao1 shu4]
to recruit/to provoke/to beckon/to incur/to infect/contagious/a move (chess)/a maneuver/device/trick/to confess
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: I have discovered a brilliant trick.
sentences.chinese: 我发现了一个聪明的招数。

sentences.english: I won't fall for that gag again.
sentences.chinese: 我再不会被那种招数骗倒了。

sentences.english: The response to these in-roads by European competitors has been predictable.
sentences.chinese: 对欧洲竞争者的这些招数的回应都是预料之中的。

sentences.english: In order to win the game he called on all his skill.
sentences.chinese: 为了打赢这场比赛，他施展出了全部招数。

sentences.english: Now China will pull out all the stops to make sure Modiji doesn't become PM.
sentences.chinese: 现在中国会使出所有招数以确保穆迪当不成总理。

sentences.english: They tried all kinds of tactics to get us to go.
sentences.chinese: 他们施尽所有的招数想让我们去。

sentences.english: “The T. rex probably couldn’t have done the arm-wrestling move, ” Conrad says. “So maybe you could get him on a technicality.”
sentences.chinese: 霸王龙学不会摔跤的招数，也许你能在这上面赢过它。

sentences.english: “The T. rex probably couldn’t have done the arm-wrestling move,” Conrad says. “So maybe you could get him on a technicality。”
sentences.chinese: 霸王龙学不会摔跤的招数，也许你能在这上面赢过它。

sentences.english: This statement criticizing her, I am afraid they are even behind her husband's new tricks.
sentences.chinese: 而她的这番批评，恐怕又是力挺丈夫的新招数。

sentences.english: These tricks alone should double your reading speed very soon.
sentences.chinese: 只是这些招数就能很快让你的阅读速度提高一倍。

sentences.english: I won't fall for that 2)gag again.
sentences.chinese: 我再不会被那种招数骗倒了。

sentences.english: Here are eight tips to help you keep control of this enemy.
sentences.chinese: 现在就教您制敌的八大招数。

sentences.english: I'm not worried about Taylor. I've got his numberand I know what to expect.
sentences.chinese: 我不担心泰勒，我了解他的招数，知道怎么应对。
不如试试这些省钱的小招数。

sentences.english: After trying countless different methods to get her to smile, a Minister came up with an idea.
sentences.chinese: 百般招数无效后，有一大臣出主意让周幽王点燃烽火。

definition: unique skill/unexpected tricky move (as a last resort)/masterstroke/finishing blow
to make a move (in martial arts or figuratively)
to use fully/to put to use
to counter every move/to be full of tricks
